bug.short_desc: [1.8][compiler] Cannot infer type arguments for Junk14<>

long_desc.thetext: NOTE: This is a regression. It used to work fine before I updated from the Eclipse 8 update site.

Compiles fine on HEAD (8 warnings).
I'll try to find the range where this was broken.

Same analysis as bug 430040:
Broken by the fix for bug 429430, published as of tag P20140309-1600
Fixed via bug 429969, published as of tag P20140310-1600.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 429969 ***
I have the latest now and it is fixed.

Regression test released here: http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?h=BETA_JAVA8&id=621e812bbb1e780712ec2dde25fd4e3f30e9c448
Already verified by reporter.
